message: For example, the stuff that wasn't discussed today. Google algo and it's impact on Mahalo. http://www.seobook.com/google-kills-ehows-competitors#

Takeaway here is, there already is a chat in Ustream. And during the show it moves very quickly. Also urls are disabled by default in the chat to prevent spam so it's hard to promote the link. And check out the link. Maybe a built-in link shortener for sharing would help.  What I do think is that if @Jason announced the Convore discussion as the show came to a close, there could be a turnout to follow-up.
Not to mention the first on-show mention of Tyler's new startup, http://www.Skweal.com Barely a blip. Although Tyler did stick around in the chat for a minute to answer some questions.
On a lighter note, it seems the Launch Conference couldn't have gone better. http://techdrawl.com/News-Post/Tech-Transfer/Seven-Takeaways-From-Jason-Calacanis-Launch-Conference
Oh, and no TED poker game?
